title: Manager, Marketing Services - APAC
overview: The Marketing Services Manager will be responsible for managing relationships with cross-functional teams, external partners, and agencies to execute marketing campaigns and secure approvals for off-service marketing campaigns.
description:
Netflix is one of the world's leading entertainment services with members enjoying TV series, films and games across a wide variety of genres and languages. Members can play, pause and resume watching as much as they want, anytime, anywhere, and can change their plans at any time. 

The Opportunity
Marketing Services supports Netflix’s marketing mission by working closely with multiple teams, such as Marketing, Publicity and Social, to help execute their visions and amplify the conversations around the world. Our team serves as the main point of contact between Netflix teams and external licensed partners (i.e. Dharma Productions, Red Chillies Entertainment, etc) to secure approvals for off-service marketing campaigns, share pre-approved promotional assets, and provide guidelines when teams are creating assets.

The ideal Marketing Services Manager candidate is a self-motivated worker who thrives in an environment that relies on self-discipline and the ability to set and meet simultaneous daily and long-term deadlines. You are extremely detail-oriented and a strong communicator who responds well in a fast-paced environment. You have experience in building relationships with external agencies and content partners. With shifting priorities and multiple deadlines, this position requires a high level of multi-tasking and follow-through.

extras.title: Candidate Profile
content: Minimum 10 years of experience dealing with digital assets and partner relationships in a studio or entertainment related environment
Ability to build relationships with external partners and able to come up with solutions when issue rises
Ability to manage and prioritize multiple time-sensitive tasks simultaneously and independently in a fast paced, high volume environment
Healthy interactions with marketing teams, creative agencies as well as familiarity with studio/network campaigns or entertainment branding
Assess cross-functional workflow and problem solve for operational efficiencies
Passion for film & television is a must

extras.title: Responsibilities
content: Manage relationships with all the different cross-functional country leads (region-based Marketing, Social, Publicity, and Product), and act as a central cross-functional liaison with a focus on managing workflow and being able to socialize, absorb, organize and address cross-functional feedback (where possible)
Act as the point of contact with external social & PR agencies
Independently build trust and manage relationships with external licensed partners and studios, and depending on the case, negotiate with them for the best interests of Netflix
Independently execute and use discretion to escalate issues in a timely and appropriate manner
Consistently seeking to simplify complex issues, identify future opportunities and challenges, and proactively brainstorm solutions with other cross-functional leaders
Access reporting tools to analyze / confirm top performing & upcoming content
Source/review/prioritize/track digital assets, and handle creative asset rights and approvals for both India and APAC countries outside of India
Understand, advocate, and embody the company’s values and team goals
